data.text: @VikingVorHan @whiskeyandspite @nzherald To an extent, I understand why Jacinda disagrees with the protestors. However, it also means she disagrees with our High Court. And, considering her penchant for ignoring democratic ideals, it makes me wonder how long it will be before she starts locking up judges.

@G_baller_NZ @nzherald If we are sick understaffed overworked and a country ripping itself to pieces what is it Weare gonna do for anyone??? Sure back Ukraine do what you do but focus on home before we get side swiped by something else coming.

@VikingVorHan @whiskeyandspite @nzherald As for the mandates being unlawful, I can't argue with that. Well, I definitely could argue that they should be lawful (considering our health system is at risk), but I can't argue that NZ's High Court deems them unlawful, because it damn well does!

Jacinda knows where this conversation goes.
